dict.acceptation: 允许；批准，正式认可，认可；

sent.orig: This constructor exists for use by the Policy object instantiate new Permission objects.
sent.trans: 存在该构造函数是因为Policy对象要用来实例化新的Permission对象。

sent.orig: Environmental Protection Administrative Permission Hearing Regulation (for Trial Implementation) prescribes the environmental administrative permission hearing system.
sent.trans: 《环境保护行政许可听证暂行办法》规定了环境行政许可听证制度。

sent.orig: When I want sth, I'm sure I could get it without anyone's permission (permission).
sent.trans: 当我想要某些东西，我肯定不需要任何人同意，我都能得到。

sent.orig: When importing an interop method, assert unmanaged code permission, and demand appropriate permission instead.
sent.trans: 当引入一个互操作方法时，要断言不可控代码操作允许，并且声明相应的允许权限。

sent.orig: Permission for '|' is currently restricted. Files with restricted permission cannot be inserted into this workbook.
sent.trans: “|”的权限当前被限制。带有限制权限的文件无法被插入到此工作簿。
